article_title: Snoop Dogg fist-bumps with John Kerry at the White House
article_text:
Topics: hip-hop, John Kerry, snoop dogg, White House, Media News, Entertainment News

A long way from Compton, Secretary of State John Kerry and Snoop Dogg (or is it Snoop Lion now?) fist-bumped at the White House (prompting the comment from V.P. Joe Biden, “Ooh, he gave you the pound!”).

The surprising hangout took place at a party in early December hosted by the Obama administration to honor the 2013 Kennedy Center Honorees.

Read more: John Kerry and Snoop Dogg Chat, Fist-Bump at White House Party

Snoop posted the video of the bump (a double fist-pound) on his Instagram account, commenting “boss life.”

Certainly not the most controversial fist-bump in the Obama White House.
